WAGE = Â£10 PER HOUR
ADD WAGE TO EVERY VALUE

HOURLY WAGE (HOURS/MECHANIC ID) + PART VALUE (ID) = COST
1.  50.00(5) + 400.65(5+10)			= 450.65
2.  70.00(7) + 289.66(8+9+19+13)	= 359.66
3.  20.00(2) + 39.56(14+3)			= 59.56
4.  10.00(1) + 60.99(7)				= 70.99
5.  80.00(8) + 481.76(5+12+16+17)	= 561.76
6.  20.00(2) + 29.71(4+13)			= 49.71
7.  50.00(5) + 389.33(21+5+6)		= 439.33
8.  50.00(5) + 332.88(22+11+12+10)	= 382.88
9.  30.00(3) + 306.99(5)			= 336.99
10. 40.00(4) + 121.76(11+14)		= 161.76
11. 70.00(7) + 504.86(8+9+11+12)	= 574.86
12. 10.00(1) + 60.99(7)				= 70.99
13. 60.00(6) + 223.00(8+7+3+20+22)	= 283.00
14. 20.00(2) + 32.57(14+15+18+19)	= 52.57
15. 60.00(6) + 450.87(5+12+16)		= 510.87
16. 30.00(3) + 151.65(10+7)			= 181.65
17. 10.00(1) + 7.99(15)				= 17.99
18. 20.00(2) + 57.70(3+4+6)			= 77.70
19. 50.00(5) + 277.97(8+9+15)		= 327.97
20. 30.00(3) + 71.11(16+17+19+22)	= 101.11
